name: Installus links
author: installus.net

sections.installation:
There are three easy steps to get the most value from the Installus links.

To install the plugin:

  1. Install the Installus links plugin using the WordPress Plugin Installer here.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in your WordPress Dashboard.
  3. That’s it! Once activated, your links will automatically be localized for your international audience.

To connect your installuslink account:

  1. If you don’t have an account already, create a installus.net account here.
  2. After signing in, navigate to the Sources page to create a new Site.
  3. Access the Installus links Settings through the “Settings” tab within your WordPress dashboard.
  4. Copy the SiteID into your Installus links plugin.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

There are three easy steps to get the most value from the Installus links.

To install the plugin:

  1. Install the Installus links plugin using the WordPress Plugin Installer here.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in your WordPress Dashboard.
  3. That’s it! Once activated, your links will automatically be localized for your international audience.

To connect your installuslink account:

  1. If you don’t have an account already, create a installus.net account here.
  2. After signing in, navigate to the Sources page to create a new Site.
  3. Access the Installus links Settings through the “Settings” tab within your WordPress dashboard.
  4. Copy the SiteID into your Installus links plugin.

short_description: Download the Installus links to automatically replace .exe or .zip links to partner code of Installus.net.
